h100.manufacturing_cost: Confidential (Est: Very High - $5000-$8000+ range based on die size, packaging, HBM)

cost_breakdown.silicon: Confidential (Est: Dominated by large TSMC 4N die cost)

a100.manufacturing_cost: Confidential (Est: Lower than H100, but still high)
a100.suggested_retail: Varies widely based on market availability (~$10,000 - $15,000+)

mi300x.manufacturing_cost: Confidential (Est: High - Complex multi-die CoWoS packaging, HBM)
mi300x.gross_margin: Confidential (AMD Datacenter segment margin lower than NVIDIA's)

arc_gpu.comment: Specific cost analysis for Intel Arc discrete GPUs (especially consumer) is scarce. Focus is currently on competitive pricing in mid-range.

industry_analysis.average_gross_margin: Varies (Datacenter GPUs: Very High ~60-80%, Consumer GPUs: Lower)
industry_analysis.cost_trend: Increasing significantly due to advanced node (3nm/4nm) wafer costs, advanced packaging (CoWoS, Foveros), and HBM memory.
industry_analysis.main_cost_driver: Advanced Node Wafer Cost + Advanced Packaging + HBM Memory
